house_listing.house_description: This condominium built in 1981 has 3 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 1 car attached garage and approximately 2388 square feet of living area. Features include private pool, private spa, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Kent Karlock Realt Lic. Real Estate Broker
